html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-12002024-11-08HC
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectTents Regulations
PrecisTENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace the current fire-safety labelling and flammability performance requirements with requirements developed by the Canadian General Standards Board; (2) include children's play tents in the Toys Regulations; and (3) exclude products from the Textile Flammability Regulations that are regulated under the Toys Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0217 Publication Date: 2024-11-20
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: TENTS REGULATIONS in order to (1) replace the current fire-safety labelling and flammability performance requirements with requirements developed by the Canadian General Standards Board; (2) include children's play tents in the Toys Regulations; and (3) exclude products from the Textile Flammability Regulations that are regulated under the Toys Regulations.
